ee:variables.ee:set-variable: #[ %dw 2.0 output application/json skipNullOn="everywhere" --- " SELECT top " ++ vars.maxRecords as String ++ " RTRIM(CustomerAccountNumber_Key) as CustomerAccountNumber_Key, " ++ " RTRIM(Agency_Code) as Agency_Code, " ++ " RTRIM(AgencyName) as AgencyName, " ++ " RTRIM(Region_Code) as Region_Code, " ++ " RTRIM(RegionName) as RegionName, " ++ " RTRIM(Tribe_Code) as Tribe_Code, " ++ " RTRIM(TribeName) as TribeName, " ++ " FORMAT(StartTime, 'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffZ') AS ValidFrom " ++ " FROM Vcrm_RegionAgencyTribe " ++ " WHERE StartTime > :validFrom " ]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload map (item, value) ->{ account: item.CustomerAccountNumber_Key as String, agencyCode: item.Agency_Code, agencyDescription: item.AgencyName, regionCode: item.Region_Code, regionDescription: item.RegionName, tribeCode: item.Tribe_Code, tribeDescription: item.TribeName, date: item.ValidFrom }
